property.name: targets
property.description: Resources to target. Operation will be limited to these resources and their dependencies.

property.name: inputVariables
property.description: Input variables to be used in the Terraform configuration.

property.name: secretInputVariables
property.description: Secret input variables to be used in the Terraform configuration.

property.name: outputVariables
property.description: Output variables captured in deployed. Key is the alias name and value is the terraform output property value for a given resource.

property.name: parallelism
property.description: Limit the number of parallel resource operations.
